content: साधर्म्यं {@--1@} Sameness or community of duty, office &c.; पंचमं लोकपालानामूचुः साधर्म्ययोगतः <ls>R. 17. 78.</ls> {@--2@} Sameness of nature, common character, likeness, community of properties; साधर्म्यमुपमा भेदे <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; <ls>Bg. 14. 2</ls>, <ls>Bhāṣā P. 12.</ls> {@--3@} Being of the same religion.
